diff_hunk:
@@ -131,7 +132,11 @@ def _as_tuple(x):
         return x,
 
 
-def gradcheck(func, inputs, eps=1e-6, atol=1e-5, rtol=1e-3, raise_exception=False):
+def _differentiable_outputs(x):
+    return tuple(o for o in _as_tuple(x) if o.requires_grad or o.grad_fn is not None)
body: If `o.requires_grad is False`, then it doesn't matter if it has a `grad_fn` (the grad should not depend on grad_output of this output). Also, in a few commits all Variables that have `o.requires_grad is False` won't have `grad_fn`s
body_html: If o.requires_grad is False, then it doesn't matter if it has a grad_fn (the grad should not depend on grad_output of this output). Also, in a few commits all Variables that have o.requires_grad is False won't have grad_fns
